title: Las Vegas boy found dead in freezer, mother’s boyfriend arrested: police - New York Post
content:
1. Las Vegas boy found dead in freezer, mother’s boyfriend arrested: police  New York Post
  2. Breaking: Las Vegas police investigate 'domestic related' homicide of child  KTNV Channel 13 Las Vegas
  3. Las Vegas police find child's body in freezer; mother's boyfriend arrested, identified  8 News NOW Las Vegas
  4. Preschooler found dead in freezer after sibling brings note to school, tipping off police  Reno Gazette Journal
  5. Girl brings note to school, leading Las Vegas police to brother's body in freezer  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Las Vegas police are continuing to investigate the death of a child after his body was found in a freezer in a home where his mother and her boyfriend were living, officials said.
